_comment: [01]     = endpoints 0 or 1 only (default - treats these as 'primary')
SWITCHTYPE VALUES (only set for devices Domoticz creates incorrectly):
2  = Contact          - For alert sensors (can't be UI-toggled)
5  = Smoke Detector   - For smoke/heat alarms (adds Reset button)
8  = Motion Sensor    - For legacy binary motion sensors
13 = Alarm icon       - Used for alert sensors (Overcurrent, Overload, etc.)
NOTE: Most devices (dimmers, switches, blinds, motion CC113, door contacts)
are created correctly by Domoticz and don't need switchType overrides.

rules.name: Remove Current Value for Switch Multilevel
rules.description: Removes 'Current Value' suffix for dimmer/multilevel switch devices. No switchType - CC38 is used for both dimmers AND blinds.

rules.name: Remove Current Value for Switch Binary
rules.description: Removes 'Current Value' suffix for binary switch devices.
